title: Update System.Security.Cryptography.Xml for CVE-2022-34716
body:
As per https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/232
System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 6.0.1 has the update for CVE-2022-34716

Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core depends on the vulnerable 6.0.0.
This should be updated to 6.0.1 or newer to patch.

It appears that this dependency is managed by dependabot here: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/eng/dependabot/Packages.props#L52
